name: Avlien.GitHub.io
body:
# Welcome
Welcome to the GitHub page for AVLien Media, a tech/design/art company located on the planet Earth! We thank you for your interest in our venture, and look forward to your participation, however large or small your contribution may be.

# Projects
## The AVLien Network
The AVLien Network (working title) is a proof of concept project to show what possibilities open source software and low-cost hosting can provide to art & music communities. It is the brainchild of Durham Bell, who drew inspiration when reading about early iterations of two related projects: [Commons in a Box](http://commonsinabox.org/) and [BuddyPress](https://buddypress.org/), both social networking frameworks based on the [WordPress](https://wordpress.org/) content management system.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
